verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H5197>drop<s%> thy word toward the <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H3318>Behold<s%>, I am against thee, and will draw forth my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath<s%>, and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from thee the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

Seeing <S%H3282><s%> then that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from thee the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, therefore shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath<s%> against all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%>:

and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have drawn <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath<s%>; it shall not return any <S%H7725>more<s%>.

Sigh <S%H584><s%> <S%H1121>therefore<s%>, thou son of <S%H120>man<s%>; with the <S%H7670>breaking<s%> of thy <S%H4975>loins<s%> and with <S%H4814>bitterness<s%> shalt thou <S%H584>sigh<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And it shall <S%H559>be<s%>, when they say unto <S%H584>thee<s%>, Wherefore sighest <S%H559>thou<s%>? that thou shalt say, Because of the <S%H8052>tidings<s%>, for it <S%H935>cometh<s%>; and every <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt<s%>, and all <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble<s%>, and every <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3543>faint<s%>, and all <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>: <S%H935>behold<s%>, it cometh, and it shall be <S%H1961>done<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H559>Say<s%>, A <S%H2719>sword<s%>, a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, it is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%>, and also <S%H4803>furbished<s%>;

it is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> that it may make <S%H2874>a<s%> <S%H2873>slaughter<s%>; it is <S%H4178>furbished<s%> that it may be as <S%H1300>lightning<s%>: <S%H176>shall<s%> we then make <S%H7797>mirth<s%>? the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%>, it <S%H3988>contemneth<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

And it is <S%H5414>given<s%> to be <S%H4803>furbished<s%>, that it may be <S%H3709>handled<s%>: the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, it is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%>, <S%H4178>yea<s%>, it is furbished, to <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2026>slayer<s%>.

Cry <S%H2199><s%> and <S%H3213>wail<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>; for it is upon my <S%H5971>people<s%>, it is upon all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: they are <S%H4048>delivered<s%> over <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> with my <S%H5971>people<s%>; <S%H5606>smite<s%> therefore upon thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%>.
For there is a <S%H974>trial<s%>; and what if even the <S%H7626>rod<s%> that <S%H3988>contemneth<s%> shall be no <S%H5002>more<s%>? saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

Thou <S%H1121>therefore<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> thy <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5221>together<s%>; and let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> be <S%H3717>doubled<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2719>time<s%>, the sword of the deadly <S%H2491>wounded<s%>: it is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> one that is deadly <S%H2491>wounded<s%>, which entereth into their <S%H2314>chambers<s%>.

I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H19>threatening<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against all their <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that their <S%H3820>heart<s%> may <S%H4127>melt<s%>, and their <S%H4383>stumblings<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>: <S%H253>ah<s%>! it is <S%H6213>made<s%> as <S%H1300>lightning<s%>, it is <S%H4593>pointed<s%> for <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>.
Gather thee <S%H258>together<s%>, go <S%H7760>to<s%> the <S%H3231>right<s%>, set thyself in <S%H8041>array<s%>, go to the left, <S%H575>whithersoever<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H3259>set<s%>.
I will also <S%H5221>smite<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3709>together<s%>, and I will cause my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%>: <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto me <S%H559>again<s%>, saying,

Also <S%H1121><s%>, thou son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>appoint<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%>; they <S%H8147>twain<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>: and mark <S%H1254>out<s%> a <S%H3027>place<s%>, mark it <S%H1254>out<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%>, and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H1219>fortified<s%>.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H517>parting<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, to <S%H7080>use<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%>: he <S%H7043>shook<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> to and <S%H7592>fro<s%>, he consulted the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, he <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H3516>liver<s%>.

In his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> was the <S%H7081>divination<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%>, to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H7524>slaughter<s%>, to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting<s%>, to <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> against the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, to <S%H8210>cast<s%> up <S%H5550>mounds<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1785>forts<s%>.

And it shall be unto them as a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>divination<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, who have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H7621>oaths<s%> unto <S%H5771>them<s%>; but he bringeth iniquity to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>, that they may be <S%H8610>taken<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Because ye have made your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>, in that your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, so that in all your <S%H5949>doings<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> do <S%H7200>appear<s%>; because that ye are come to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>, ye shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the <S%H3709>hand<s%>.

And <S%H2491>thou<s%>, O deadly wounded <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5387>one<s%>, the prince of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whose <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%>,

thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H4701>mitre<s%>, and take <S%H7311>off<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%>; this shall be no more the <S%H2063>same<s%>; <S%H1361>exalt<s%> that which is <S%H8217>low<s%>, and <S%H8213>abase<s%> that which is <S%H1364>high<s%>.

I will <S%H5754>overturn<s%>, <S%H5754>overturn<s%>, <S%H5754>overturn<s%> <S%H7760>it<s%>: this also shall be no <S%H935>more<s%>, until he come whose <S%H4941>right<s%> it <S%H5414>is<s%>; and I will give it him.

And <S%H1121>thou<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> concerning the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%>, and concerning their <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H2719>thou<s%>, A sword, a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H6605>drawn<s%>, for the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished<s%>, to cause it to <S%H398>devour<s%>, that it may be as <S%H1300>lightning<s%>;

while they <S%H2372>see<s%> for thee false <S%H7080>visions<s%>, while they divine <S%H3577>lies<s%> unto <S%H6677>thee<s%>, to lay thee upon the necks of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> that are deadly <S%H3117>wounded<s%>, whose day is <S%H935>come<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%>.

Cause it to <S%H7725>return<s%> into its <S%H8593>sheath<s%>. In the <S%H4725>place<s%> where thou wast <S%H1254>created<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H4351>birth<s%>, will I judge <S%H8199>thee<s%>.

And I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> upon <S%H6315>thee<s%>; I will blow upon thee with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1197>brutish<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H2796>skilful<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy<s%>.

Thou shalt be for <S%H402>fuel<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%>; thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; thou shalt be no more <S%H2142>remembered<s%>: for <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.
